abstract: Lions Gate Entertainment said Monday that it was considering whether to negotiate with the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, who has made a hostile $7-a-share offer for the movie studio.
snippet: Lions Gate Entertainment said Monday that it was considering whether to negotiate with the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, who has made a hostile $7-a-share offer for the movie studio.
lead_paragraph: Lions Gate Entertainment said Monday that it was considering whether to negotiate with the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, who has made a hostile $7-a-share offer for the movie studio, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Lions Gate Considers Negotiations With Icahn
